title: I Plan on Forever
description: Danielle Jacobs never thought she would find love again, but when Kyler Lawson opened the front door, everything changed. He opened her heart to love again. Almost four years later, their wedding day finally arrives. Family and friends travel from near and far to witness them promise each other forever. Kyler may not have been her first love, but he plans on being her last.
author: Stefanie Jenkins
